items.title: I never liked technical interviews
items.description: I never liked technical interviews. When I was a young developer, certain interviews made me feel so bad that I developed interviewingophobia ‚Äì unconditional fear of all interviews. Instead of enjoying technical interviews and learning from senior colleagues, I tried to survive. Survive like prey, surrounded by all-knowing hyenas.
